About the Authors

My name is Abhinav Lavu, and I am a sophmore at Innovation Academy. I am Life Scout at Troop 2000, and I love to spend my free time volunteering, coding, and learning new topics in STEM. I am the CFO of an international student-led nonprofit called Hands of Cope. I am also part of the Innovation Academy 8866 FRC Robotics Team. I am in AI Pathway in IA. I choose to be part of AI because I want to learn and be part of something that can revolutionize the future!

My name is Tristan I have two dogs, Logan and Piper, and am currently enrolled in the Artificial Intelligence program at Innovation Academy. I enrolled because I wanted to grow my computer skills and better understand a growing field that could have a heavy impact on the future of Information Technology. I also wanted to improve on it for my brother who loves uses Artificial Intelligence and will definitely want to participate in this program when he comes to Innovation Academy.
